Articles.Content:
![Vi6IiQG.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Vi6IiQG.jpg)

On the launch pad

![sRsPWsw.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/sRsPWsw.jpg)

separating stages

![LpEzqfC.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/LpEzqfC.jpg)

On my way!

![s6wr9U1.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/s6wr9U1.jpg)

Hello Mun! May i say you look ravishing today ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

![diLcyy8.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/diLcyy8.jpg)

Landing...

![KGphlDq.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/KGphlDq.jpg)

Touchdown!

![UoXKsV6.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/UoXKsV6.jpg)

This is the obligatory explosion shot from the removed landing engines

![JEUQRmB.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/JEUQRmB.jpg)

Release the Car!

![Zka659e.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Zka659e.jpg)

First glamour shot!

![qJaboxx.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/qJaboxx.jpg)

This is Seanbo on the left. His notable achievements are rescuing Jeb and building an early station. oh and Edrod is on the right. he hasn't done anything before

![9YjQxeS.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/9YjQxeS.jpg)

Five seconds after this screenshot i noticed i was going the wrong way

![h6n0D7e.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/h6n0D7e.jpg)

There are only a few small craters in the way of the closest moon arch. shouldn't be hard

![xWJCOSg.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/xWJCOSg.jpg)

I may have underestimated the size of these crators

![8fEmYz8.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/8fEmYz8.jpg)

Going back home as im too lazy to go that distance

![iRB8sP4.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/iRB8sP4.jpg)

LOOK AT THAT SWEET AIR TIME! Or should i say, Space time! NYEAAAAA

![ejwEKTU.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ejwEKTU.jpg)

Welp it appears i flipped it

![dKqYsS5.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/dKqYsS5.jpg)

After using half an EVA pack to flip it back up Fondie comes out to look at the view with the others

Are those....hot pink landing lights? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Very cool lifter though, nice looking design. Never thought of using Mk3 parts like that.

> 
> Are those....hot pink landing lights? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
> Very cool lifter though, nice looking design. Never thought of using Mk3 parts like that.

yeah they are hot pink lights, i was aiming for a nice redish purple but i didnt test my lights before hand. Thanks, i really like my lifter design. It just feels nice to look at
Very nice stuff! Had a laugh when I saw the one with the rover "flying" over the crater!
